parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The path type of the web directory. Valid values:

*   **def**: automatically identified
*   **customize**: manually added

parameters.name: WebPath
parameters.description: The path to the web directory.
